item.title: Watch Analytics
item.description:
Watch Analytics is a data-analysis project that offers tools and dashboards to visualize wristwatch metrics and trends. The project utilizes Python and modern visualization libraries to help users explore, compare, and gain insights from watch datasets.

Technologies Used

  • Python
  • Pandas
  • Matplotlib & Seaborn
  • Jupyter Notebooks

Key Features

  • Clean, open-source code for custom analytics
  • Exportable charts and reports
  • Out-of-the-box demo datasets
  • Extensible with new metrics or watch types

Demo

See the code, sample reports, and instructions on GitHub.
